text: The basis of our partnership strategy and our partnership approach: We build the social technology. They provide the music.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

text: Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

text: The music of Hendrix wakes people up to their possibilities. It's more than just dreaming about being a guitar hero.
author: Carlos Santana

text: I don't like to be labeled, to be anything. I've made the mistake before myself of labeling my music, but it's counter-productive.
author: Neil Young

text: I have so many opinions about everything it just comes out during my music. It's a battle for me. I try not to be preachy. That's a real danger.
author: Neil Young
